de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

Interface IDrawPanel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DrawPanel

    public interface IDrawPanel
    Interface for draw panels for GUI models.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateDrawArcMode()
      Handles the request to activate the "draw new arc" mode for the MyMouseAdapter on this draw panel.
      void deactivateDrawArcMode()
      Handles the request to deactivate the "draw new arc" mode for the MyMouseAdapter on this draw panel.
      boolean getCtrlKeyPressed()
      Returns the state of the CTRL key on this IDrawPanel.
      java.lang.String getDisplayName()
      Returns the display name of this draw panel.
      java.awt.Point getInitialDraggedFrom()
      Returns the location from where the current dragging operation has started.
      int getMaxZValue()
      Returns the maximum Z value for all elements in this draw panels GUI model.
      int getMinZValue()
      Returns the minimum Z value for all elements in this draw panels GUI model.
      java.lang.String getModelName()
      Returns the full name of this draw panel.
      java.awt.Point getMouseDraggedFrom()
      Returns the location from where the last step of the current dragging operation has started.
      java.awt.Point getMouseDraggedTo()
      Returns the target of the current dragging operation.
      java.awt.Point getMousePressedLocation()
      Returns the location of the mousePressed event stored by setMousePressedLocation(p).
      java.awt.Point getPopupMenuLocation()
      Callback for the IGuiModelController.
      java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize()
      Returns the preferred size of this draw panel.
      ENodeType getSourceForNewArcType()
      Returns the type of node currently set as source for the new IGuiArc to be added by the IGuiModelController.
      boolean getStateAddingNewArc()
      Checks if the IGuiModelController is currently in the state to add a new IGuiArc.
      boolean getStateMouseDragMode()
      Returns whether the mouse is in drag mode or not.
      int getZValue(IGuiElement element)
      Returns the z value of an element.

      Resets the state of this DrawPanel (e.g.

      Stores where the current dragging operation has started.

      Stores the target of the current dragging operation.

      Stores the specified location as last mousePressed event.

      Tells the draw panel if there is a popup menu active.

    • Method Detail

      • getModelName

        java.lang.String getModelName()
        Returns the full name of this draw panel. This should be the canonical (unique) path name of the file.
        Returns:
        The full name

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Returns the display name of this draw panel.

        Intended use: name of the tab
        Returns:
        The display name

      • getPreferredSize

        java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize()
        Returns the preferred size of this draw panel.

        Note: Used in ApplicationController to update the StatusBar.
        Returns:
        Dimension

      • updateDrawing

        void updateDrawing(java.awt.Rectangle area)
        Tells the draw panel to update its content.
        Parameters:
        area - The area to update; set to null for complete repaint

      • getMousePressedLocation

        java.awt.Point getMousePressedLocation()
        Returns the location of the mousePressed event stored by setMousePressedLocation(p).
        Returns:
        A Point

      • setMousePressedLocation

        void setMousePressedLocation(java.awt.Point p)
        Stores the specified location as last mousePressed event.
        Parameters:
        p - The specified Point

      • getStateMouseDragMode

        boolean getStateMouseDragMode()
        Returns whether the mouse is in drag mode or not.
        Returns:
        The current "mouseDragMode" state

      • setStateMouseDragMode

        void setStateMouseDragMode(boolean b)
        Callback for the MyMouseAdapter to set the "mouseDragMode" state of this IDrawPanel.
        Parameters:
        b - The new state

      • getInitialDraggedFrom

        java.awt.Point getInitialDraggedFrom()
        Returns the location from where the current dragging operation has started.
        Returns:
        A Point

      • setInitialDraggedFrom

        void setInitialDraggedFrom(java.awt.Point p)
        Stores where the current dragging operation has started.
        Parameters:
        p - The specified Point

      • getMouseDraggedFrom

        java.awt.Point getMouseDraggedFrom()
        Returns the location from where the last step of the current dragging operation has started.
        Returns:
        A Point

      • setMouseDraggedFrom

        void setMouseDraggedFrom(java.awt.Point p)
        Stores where the last step of the current dragging operation has started.
        Parameters:
        p - The specified Point

      • getMouseDraggedTo

        java.awt.Point getMouseDraggedTo()
        Returns the target of the current dragging operation.
        Returns:
        A Point

      • setMouseDraggedTo

        void setMouseDraggedTo(java.awt.Point p)
        Stores the target of the current dragging operation.
        Parameters:
        p - The specified Point

      • updateMousePos

        void updateMousePos(java.awt.Point pos)
        Updates the mouse position info on the status bar.
        Parameters:
        pos - The new mouse position as Point

      • getCtrlKeyPressed

        boolean getCtrlKeyPressed()
        Returns the state of the CTRL key on this IDrawPanel.
        Returns:
        True = CTRL pressed, false = CTRL not pressed

      • setToolTipText

        void setToolTipText(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the tool tip text for the current mouse position on this DrawPanel.
        Parameters:
        text - The tool tip text

      • resetState

        void resetState()
        Resets the state of this DrawPanel (e.g. Cursor, old mouse operations interrupted by tab switching etc.)

        Note: Otherwise, a draw panel with the "moveCursor" could be left via tab switch using the mouse. And when the user re-enters this tab, there would still be the moveCursor active even without pressing ALT on the keyboard!

      • getMinZValue

        int getMinZValue()
        Returns the minimum Z value for all elements in this draw panels GUI model.

        Note: Intended to be used for putting an element to the background.
        Returns:
        The minimum z value

      • getMaxZValue

        int getMaxZValue()
        Returns the maximum Z value for all elements in this draw panels GUI model.

        Note: Intended to be used for putting an element to the foreground.
        Returns:
        The maximum z value

      • getZValue

        int getZValue(IGuiElement element)
        Returns the z value of an element.
        Parameters:
        element - The current element
        Returns:
        The z value (height level)

      • setPopupMenuLocation

        void setPopupMenuLocation(java.awt.Point p)
        Tells the draw panel if there is a popup menu active.
        Parameters:
        p - The location of the popup trigger; null if there is no popup menu

      • getPopupMenuLocation

        java.awt.Point getPopupMenuLocation()
        Callback for the IGuiModelController.
        Returns:
        The popup trigger location

      • getStateAddingNewArc

        boolean getStateAddingNewArc()
        Checks if the IGuiModelController is currently in the state to add a new IGuiArc.
        Returns:
        True if the GUI model controller is waiting for the second IGuiNode to finish the Arc; otherwise false.

      • getSourceForNewArcType

        ENodeType getSourceForNewArcType()
        Returns the type of node currently set as source for the new IGuiArc to be added by the IGuiModelController.
        Returns:
        The ENodeType of the node

      • activateDrawArcMode

        void activateDrawArcMode()
        Handles the request to activate the "draw new arc" mode for the MyMouseAdapter on this draw panel.

      • deactivateDrawArcMode

        void deactivateDrawArcMode()
        Handles the request to deactivate the "draw new arc" mode for the MyMouseAdapter on this draw panel.
